div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I, Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway. A LECTURE

body.p: Saturday, September 15, a lecture will be given under the sponsorship of the Russian members of the Industrial Workers of the World.
The subject, "Under What Conditions Could Socialism be Realized." The lecturer is Comrade Dmitri Stranden, who recently arrived from Soviet Russia.
The lecture will be held at the South Side Children's School's large hall, 1231 S. Morgan St. Beginning exactly at 7:30 P. M. Admission free. Come in masses.
